beer.name: Oatmeal Stout
beer.description: An aromatic blend of oats, chocolate and roast malts make up this classic English-Style Oatmeal Stout. A rich black over ruby hue and creamy tan head make our stout a memorable beer to behold.
beer.grains: -Row, Roasted Barley, Oat Flake, Barley Flake, Caramel, Debittered Black
-Row, Roasted Barley, Oat Flake, Barley Flake, Caramel, Debittered Black
